title: Hair extension removal tool

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a hair extension removal tool, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a right, top and rear side perspective view of the hair extension removal tool showing my new design;
FIG. 2 is a top plan view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a bottom plan view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a right side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a left side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a rear elevational view thereof;
FIG. 7 is a front elevational view thereof; and,
FIG. 8 is a right, top and rear side perspective view thereof showing the tool with its jaws in an open state.
